channel.title: Myspace Runescape Scammers (Idk if its been posted)
channel.description:
Lol well he sent me a message on myspace. Notice the website adress and the title of the website in the tab.
This is the Myspace Guy Who Sent It TO Me and his message:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/5463/rsscamuv8.png[/img][/URL]
This is the site you are redirected to (Most likely recording EVERYTHING you type but it does redirect you to rs forums when you hit submit)
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/9411/thescamsitejr6.jpg[/img][/URL]
Well I think its a scam but it might not be but im not trying it out lol. It about caught me at first but I noticed it wasn't www.runescape.com.
Also I do not know if this has been posted a searched for a few different things and came up with nothing like this. If it has then feel free to remove it.
This is the link to the site:http://www.cust0m.info/index.htm

item.dc:creator: @Morgoth Morgoth
item.description:
@Morgoth wrote:

Divine-Devil:

yeah I got it too, I posted it on my bulletins. Kid doesnt even look old enough for college. All he did is edit it up with some HTML and viewed the page source and edited that a lil. Its a phiser over the net…Rofl

There is a VERY small chance that he has put his real picture in myspace Good scammers/phisers would never do that.
